listeners

Class DnDListenerTagLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • listeners.DnDListenerTagLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.dnd.DragGestureListener, java.awt.dnd.DropTargetListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class DnDListenerTagLabel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.dnd.DragGestureListener, java.awt.dnd.DropTargetListener
    Every DropTarget must have its own listener. So this listener refers to Taglabel drop target In particular this listener is only used to trigger dragGestureRecognized
    Author:
    Mirco Palese
